tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Visited Dr. Sudhir N. Pai (Orthopedic surgeon) for Vascular Necrosis of Hip Joint
Excellent. He is very polite and explains the issue very well. Its a very good experience. My slip disc issue is improving. Thanks to Dr. Sudhir.
Good follow up too

Consulted Dr. Pai at St. John Hospital(Madiwala), for wrist fracture (happened in a minor bike accident). As the bone fracture was too much to do a plaster,he suggested for a minor surgery to fix an implant(as a long term/once and for all solution). We understood his suggestions and got admitted there same day.
He actively informed us about the OT availability which might delay the surgery. Though it took time OT to get free but afterwards rest of the procedure went very well and implant was fixed successfully(as planned) :-)
He regularly visited in ward after the surgery and cleared all our doubts. His team helped in preparing various necessary documents for insurance approval.
Best thing about him is his politeness,vast experience and patience to answer all your queries. He never gets irritated while answering the queries.
Unlike most of the Doctors, he shared his mobile number too in case of any help require!

I strongly recommend him and his team! BIG thanks to them for all their help and expertise:-)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: very nice doctor. highly qualified. very good diagnosis. Our all family members visit this doctor. very happy about the services. I strongly recommend to everyone.

Dr.Pai listens to the patients' problem and replies the queries rationally. He solves our health issues and all at a reasonable cost. he has the basic facilities of X-ray and Phsiotherapy in his clinic. So it is a one stop shop for satisfactory solution to Orthopaedic issues.

In first meeting with him he identified cause of pain and recommend a test of uric acid in blood serum. *** ********* *** ******* *** found high level of uric acid and in blood in test. Just following simple precautions and medicine my uric acid is reduced significantly. I am seeing improvement in my health also due to lowering in uric acid. I thank to him *** ******* ********* *** ******* ***** ******** *** ************

Dr.Pai is very experienced and has a very humble and mature way of treating people. The way he addresses the problem through his talks and diagnosis instills lot of confidence into the patients. I always would recommend him for any ortho related issues.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: Dr. Pai is a gem of a doctor. From the very first day, he was very polite and calm. He listened to the issue very clearly and immediately proceeded towards the right direction in terms of treatment. I had this knee problem for a very long time and none of the other doctors could fix it. I'm really thankful to Dr. Pai.

Doctor was very courteous and patiently explained the reason for the problem and steps to be taken to mitigate the problem. He did not order for unnecessary investigations and fees charged were very reasonable.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Doctor is so friendly..he listens to you so patiently and then he explains everything properly no matter whether the problem is small or big.

review: Gathered that Doctor normally does not visit Trustwell Hospital on Saturdays. Since we had booked through Practo, Doctor made a visit. Kindly check and update so that it will be helpful for future appointments on Saturday. Doctor was very helpful, explained in simple terms. His reassuring words and simplicity were exemplary. Hats off

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Time is not a doctor issue in St.John hospital. My mom was having issue with spinal S6. He did operation for same. 5 rating for Dr.Sudir N Pai. Very Friendly, listens to issues very patiently, communicates very clearly and doesn't mind to answer your n number of questions. Thank you Dr.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I went to treat my back pain in the month of may 2018. Doc is very friendly and makes you feel comfortable. He explained the situation, suggested what should be done and what should be avoided. I went for an X-ray examination too which was really quick. Doc also recommended physiotherapy and explained how it works. Overall experience was extremely satisfying. I would definitely recommend the clinic.
Dr is very good, he will explain the problem in detail.very polite.he has not given any extra medicine for treatment. I would recommend this Dr.
Dr. Sudhir is a humble and soft spoken person. He patiently listens to the problem and suggests with relevance to the problem. I would very much recommend Dr. Sudhir.
The doctor has clearly explained the causes of the problem and advised treatment with minimum medicines along with exercises and lifestyle changes.
The way he explained my diagnosis was very reassuring and put a lot of confidence in me to recover my mallet finger, looking forward to heal without surgery.
Doctor was able to judge intensity very fast and advised surgery. Also he showed me the pic of plate inserted in my hand post surgery.

Excellent! Dr. Pai is a thorough professional who takes time to listen to your problems. His diagnoses are spot on. His having an X-Ray facility at his clinic helps weed out the time required to go out and get one. I would strongly recommend.
Very nice doctor.. down to earth person..Good to see such a good doctor.. explains the issue clearly in detail..

** ** *** ** ***  **** **************. He is very polite and generous with the patients. My experience is too good . He provides X-ray and physiotherapy facilities also.             I recommend everyone who all are suffering from spinal and body pain to consult with him once to get a better result 

Thank you .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Regarding Knee Pain problem and I got 60% relief.
Doing exercises as per Doctors's Adviser.

Thanks to the Doctor.

He was very humble and listened to the problem well before he prescribed the medicines. 
He was also kind and understanding and did not rush into things.
Dr has lot of patience and listens to our problems.. His diagnoses  are on spot and with confidence.. He has his own x-ray facility in his clinic.
